title: The Making of Madonna | Madonna’s “Bad Feminism” with Roxane Gay | 5
description:
Madonna is an icon, a hitmaker, and a Rock and Roll Hall of Famer. But despite her incredible achievements, she’s never been cozy with feminism. This week, we chat with author and podcast host Roxane Gay about Madonna’s legacy, and how feminism can fail women who dare to be trailblazers.

Listen to Hear To Slay on Luminary, and find Bad Feminist in bookstores nationwide.

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/eventherich.

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
